definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: More than 500 sea turtles died in the spill area.
sentences.chinese: 據統計，在泄露海域有超過500只海龜死亡。

sentences.english: There is a low nutrient level in the Aoshan Bay.
sentences.chinese: 鰲山灣屬營養水平較低的海域。

sentences.english: Hymenocera elegans here is found in the waters off of Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 它們是在印尼附近的海域裏發現的鱈魚的線蟲。

sentences.english: Only off Seal Island do 16-foot great white sharks regularly catapult themselves into the air in an effort to catch and kill these seals.
sentences.chinese: 在海豹島附近海域，大白鯊常會從水中衝出獵殺海狗。

sentences.english: They also tend to increase the formation of tropical storms in the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 此外還增加了在大西洋海域熱帶風暴的形成。

sentences.english: Hector's dolphins are found only in New Zealand where the population has fallen to 7, 000.
sentences.chinese: 赫氏海豚只在新西蘭周圍的海域發現。

sentences.english: Pinghu oil and gas field is the first oil and gas field in East China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 平湖油氣田是東海海域第一個投入開發的油氣田。

sentences.english: The major control factor of water quality is precipitation and runoff.
sentences.chinese: 降雨和徑流爲三亞灣海域水質參數變化的控制因子。

sentences.english: Kuroshio intrusion engenders an eddy at the west of Kyushu Island of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 冬季日本九州西側海域存在一個半封閉的渦旋。

sentences.english: China enhances law enforcement activities in relevant waters.
sentences.chinese: 中國派遣海監船加強在相關海域執法活動。

sentences.english: The first time the world was confronted with an empty sea, was in 1992 in Newfoundland.
sentences.chinese: 世界首次面對無魚可捕的海域是1992年在紐芬蘭。

sentences.english: The Regulations Concerning the Prevention of Pollution of Sea Areas by Vessels of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中華人民共和國防止船舶污染海域管理條例。

sentences.english: Dr Steve Rintoul, the voyage leader, says the survey has revealed changes in the ocean around Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 航行負責人史帝夫說，考察顯示出南極海域的改變。

sentences.english: The Bali Barat National Park covers nearly all the coral reef and coastal waters.
sentences.chinese: 巴厘島巴莎國家公園幾乎涵蓋了所有的珊瑚礁和海域。

sentences.english: Planes and patrol vessels from both sides buzzed aroundthe disputed areas.
sentences.chinese: 雙方的飛機和巡邏船隻麇集於爭議海域。

sentences.english: “SEA of peace” is the title China has bestowed on its adjacent oceans.
sentences.chinese: 中國給其周邊海域冠以“和平之海”的名號。

definition: shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
dry land (as opposed to the sea)
East China Sea/East Sea (Chinese mythology and ancient geography)
